channel.title: Need a little help
channel.description:
on my 562 server every time i "compile" this is error i get.
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/5djx8i.jpg[/img]
and this is what is inside of the "compile"
[code]@echo off @TITLE Beta-scape if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
And if you could please post below what i should copy & paste in there.

item.title: Need a little help
item.dc:creator: @oKrump oKrump
item.description:
@oKrump wrote:

yes i do. i have jdk 26

and this is what is inside of the “compile”

@echo off @TITLE Beta-scape if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit
